mapper.sql: a.id, a.parent_id AS "parent.id", a.parent_ids, a.code, a.name, a.sort, a.type, a.remarks, a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date, a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date, a.del_flag, p.name AS "parent.name", userN.id AS "nationalPresident.id", userA.id AS "areaPresident.id", userN.name AS "nationalPresident.name", userA.name AS "areaPresident.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_office p ON p.id = a.parent_id LEFT JOIN sys_user userN ON userN.id = a.national_president LEFT JOIN sys_user userA ON userA.id = a.area_president
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.parent_id AS "parent.id", a.parent_ids FROM sys_area a WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND a.parent_ids LIKE #{parentIds} ORDER BY a.code
SELECT a.id, a.`name` FROM sys_area a WHERE a.del_flag = '0' AND a.type = '0' OR a.type = '1'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_area( id, parent_id, parent_ids, code, name, sort, type, national_president, area_president, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parent.id}, #{parentIds}, #{code}, #{name}, #{sort}, #{type}, #{nationalPresident.id}, #{areaPresident.id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_area SET parent_id = #{parent.id}, parent_ids = #{parentIds}, code = #{code}, name = #{name}, sort = #{sort}, type = #{type}, national_president = #{nationalPresident.id}, area_president = #{areaPresident.id}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE sys_area SET del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_DELETE} WHERE id = #{id} OR parent_ids LIKE '%,'||#{id}||',%' '%,'+#{id}+',%' CONCAT('%,', #{id}, ',%')
